participant_1.background:
I have a student id and hate paying my bills.
I love sharing my love of comic books and animals with others.
I've been single for a while because I'm always on the go with my work and my dreams of going to Mars.
I love making short films with my camcorder.
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm not really interested in knowing my future.

participant_2.background:
I was a good son, but we grew apart when I chose to follow my passion.
I fear the day I will have to leave my room and interact with other people.
I love to cook and try new recipes, but my favorite place to eat is at my family's house.
my husband is a lawyer.
I like to listen to music while I work out to help me push myself.

content.text: Oh boy! I have many but The Martian is a good one.
The Martian is an awesome movie! I love it too! Are you a fan of science fiction?
I am a fan of science fiction and also comic books. I love reading comic books.
That's awesome! I'm also a fan of comic books. I collect them. What's your favorite comic book?
Oh boy! I have many favorite comic books but X-men is my favorite.
X-men is an awesome comic book. I love it too! Are you a fan of the X-men movies?
I am a fan of the X-men movies but I like the original X-men movies better than the new movies.
I agree with you. The original X-men movies are better than the new movies.
